data.pricing_trends: Average cost of travel has increased by 10% over the last year; peak season rates significantly higher.
data.booking_windows: Optimal time to book: 2-3 months in advance; last-minute deals less common.
data.demand: Growing interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences; Guatemala rising in travel searches.
data.competition: Key competitors: Costa Rica, Belize, and Mexico; differentiating factors include unique culture.
